overview:
Toby Trevarthen is the Vice President of Business Development at Anchor Intelligence.

Prior to joining Anchor Intelligence, Mr. Trevarthen was the founder of Spatial Shift, a strategic advisory firm specializing in revenue creation for several start ups in mobile and ecommerce. Prior to Spatial Shift, Mr. Trevarthen spent seven years at AOL in various senior management roles in both Business Development and Sales, most recently as Regional Vice President for AOL Media Networks.

Mr. Trevarthen brings to Anchor Intelligence 25 years of media and business development experience with a track record of developing deep relationships with ad agencies, online advertisers, publishers, and traditional media. Mr. Trevarthen worked for Time Warner twice over a 14-year period, running the West Coast Integrated Sales for Time Inc as well as for AOL. Prior to AOL, Mr. Trevarthen was Vice President of Business Development for Alladvantage.com.

Mr. Trevarthen has also worked at Meredith Corporation, Gannett Corporation and started his career in the advertising agency business at Young & Rubicam. Mr. Trevarthen graduated with BA in Advertising from Michigan State University (1983). He also sits on the board of Sonoma Coast Vineyards, a Sonoma based winery.
